result.eng: The abandoned soldier continued fighting until the end.
result.ga: lean an saighdiúir tréigthe ag troid go dtí an deireadh
result.orig: lean an saighdiúir tréigthe ag troid go dtí an deireadh
result.html: lean an saighdiúir tréigthe ag troid go dtí an deireadhThe abandoned soldier continued fighting until the end.
result.ponchtml: lean an saiġdiúir tréigṫe ag troid go dtí an deireaḋThe abandoned soldier continued fighting until the end.

result.eng: We'll have to wait until Budget Day.
result.ga: beidh orainn fanacht go lá na cáinaisnéise
result.orig: beidh orainn fanacht go lá na cáinaisnéise
result.html: beidh orainn fanacht go lá na cáinaisnéiseWe'll have to wait until Budget Day.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ orainn fanaċt go lá na cáinaisnéiseWe'll have to wait until Budget Day.

result.ga: bhí mé sásta go dtí seo
result.orig: bhí mé sásta go dtí seo
result.html: bhí mé sásta go dtí seoI was happy until now.
result.ponchtml: ḃí mé sásta go dtí seoI was happy until now.

result.eng: What did you do during your life until now?
result.ga: cad a rinne tú ar feadh do shaoil go dtí seo
result.orig: cad a rinne tú ar feadh do shaoil go dtí seo
result.html: cad a rinne tú ar feadh do shaoil go dtí seoWhat did you do during your life until now?
result.ponchtml: cad a rinne tú ar feaḋ do ẛaoil go dtí seoWhat did you do during your life until now?

result.ga: fan go gcríochnóidh mé é seo
result.orig: fan go gcríochnóidh mé é seo
result.html: fan go gcríochnóidh mé é seoWait until I finish this.
result.ponchtml: fan go gcríoċnóiḋ mé é seoWait until I finish this.

result.ga: fan go lá pá
result.orig: fan go lá pá
result.html: fan go lá páWait until pay day.
result.ponchtml: fan go lá páWait until pay day.

result.eng: She kept on complaining until she got an answer.
result.ga: lean sí ag gearán léi go bhfuair sí freagra
result.orig: lean sí ag gearán léi go bhfuair sí freagra
result.html: lean sí ag gearán léi go bhfuair sí freagraShe kept on complaining until she got an answer.
result.ponchtml: lean sí ag gearán léi go ḃfuair sí freagraShe kept on complaining until she got an answer.

result.eng: I hadn't had any proper time to get down to it until now.
result.ga: ní raibh am ceart agam le tabhairt faoi go dtí seo
result.orig: ní raibh am ceart agam le tabhairt faoi go dtí seo
result.html: ní raibh am ceart agam le tabhairt faoi go dtí seoI hadn't had any proper time to get down to it until now.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ am ceart agam le taḃairt faoi go dtí seoI hadn't had any proper time to get down to it until now.

result.eng: I work from nine o'clock until one o'clock in the bookshop.
result.ga: oibrím óna naoi a chlog go dtí a haon a chlog sa siopa leabhar
result.orig: oibrím óna naoi a chlog go dtí a haon a chlog sa siopa leabhar
result.html: oibrím óna naoi a chlog go dtí a haon a chlog sa siopa leabharI work from nine o'clock until one o'clock in the bookshop.
result.ponchtml: oibrím óna naoi a ċlog go dtí a haon a ċlog sa siopa leaḃarI work from nine o'clock until one o'clock in the bookshop.

result.eng: Until next week, good-bye and God bless.
result.ga: go dtí an tseachtain seo chugainn slán agus beannacht
result.orig: go dtí an tseachtain seo chugainn slán agus beannacht
result.html: go dtí an tseachtain seo chugainn slán agus beannachtUntil next week, good-bye and God bless.
result.ponchtml: go dtí an tseaċtain seo ċugainn slán agus beannaċtUntil next week, good-bye and God bless.

result.eng: The first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.
result.ga: b'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rud
result.orig: b'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rud
result.html: b'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rudThe first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.
result.ponchtml: b'é scéiṁliṫeoireaċt an ċéad rud a riṫ le daoine sular ṫáinig deiṁniú gurḃ iad cúinsí seismeaċa ba ċúis leis an rudThe first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.

result.eng: The Nazis didn't stop with Poland  and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ga: níor stop na naitsithe leis an bpolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.orig: níor stop na naitsithe leis an bpolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.html: níor stop na naitsithe leis an bpolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maithThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ponchtml: níor stop na naitsiṫe leis an bpolainn agus níorḃ ḟada go raiḃ an ḟrainc ina seilḃ acu ċoṁ maiṫThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.

result.eng: It wasn't long until anti-slavery campaigns started.
result.ga: níorbh fhada gur thosaigh feachtais in aghaidh na sclábhaíochta
result.orig: níorbh fhada gur thosaigh feachtais in aghaidh na sclábhaíochta
result.html: níorbh fhada gur thosaigh feachtais in aghaidh na sclábhaíochtaIt wasn't long until anti-slavery campaigns started.
result.ponchtml: níorḃ ḟada gur ṫosaiġ feaċtais in aġaiḋ na scláḃaíoċtaIt wasn't long until anti-slavery campaigns started.

result.eng: It doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
result.ga: is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astu
result.orig: is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astu
result.html: is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astuIt doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
result.ponchtml: is cuma dá mbíoḋ siad ag magaḋ ort go dtiteaḋ an cár astuIt doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.

result.eng: I drank and I drank until I lost my sense and my good judgment.
result.ga: d'ól mé agus d'ól mé gur chaill mé mo mheabhair agus mo stuaim
result.orig: d'ól mé agus d'ól mé gur chaill mé mo mheabhair agus mo stuaim
result.html: d'ól mé agus d'ól mé gur chaill mé mo mheabhair agus mo stuaimI drank and I drank until I lost my sense and my good judgment.
result.ponchtml: d'ól mé agus d'ól mé gur ċaill mé mo ṁeaḃair agus mo stuaimI drank and I drank until I lost my sense and my good judgment.
